title: What to Watch: Six Movies and Shows to Stream
sub_head: A remake of ‘Diary of a Wimpy Kid’ hits Disney+, Tracy Oliver channels ‘Sex and the City’ for the new series ‘Harlem,’ and more to add to your queue
body:
This week, Jeff Kinney retells the “Wimpy Kid” origin story in movie form; Tracy Oliver tells the story of Black women on the New York dating scene in “Harlem,” and X Ambassadors frontman Sam Harris turns the band’s new album, “The Beautiful Liar,” into a podcast about a blind superhero. Here’s where to stream it all:
(Disney+)
